body:
So, Thanks to Nolan he gave me the BEST SITE EVER to get a plan for my server witch is 25$ for unlimited everything, ram, memory,bandwith, ect, (I got a coupon so its 22 monthly). But my question is, how do I make it like avicus, with a lobby, different gamemode teleporters, e.c.t.
-NOTE- I am not gonna be like quoll craft xD


Thanks for all the help, when I make the server I will announce and mssg me on skype for ip, will also be making my own website for it too :P
